languages.text: {n}Преподобный Адальберт горестно качает головой.{/n} "Это были добрые люди, набожные люди. Невинные... Они в жизни не тронули ни одного серфа. За что карать... их?" {n}Его лицо чернеет.{/n} "Клянусь, что невинные будут отомщены — Император тому свидетель".

traits.locale_text: {n}Преподобный Адальберт горестно качает головой.{/n} "Это были добрые люди, набожные люди. Невинные... Они в жизни не тронули ни одного серфа. За что карать... их?" {n}Его лицо чернеет.{/n} "Клянусь, что невинные будут отомщены — Император тому свидетель".

languages.text: {n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."
languages.original_text: {n}Преподобный Адальберт горестно качает головой.{/n} "Это были добрые люди, набожные люди. Невинные... Они в жизни не тронули ни одного серфа. За что карать... их?" {n}Его лицо чернеет.{/n} "Клянусь, что невинные будут отомщены — Император тому свидетель".

traits.locale_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. Innocent ones. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that the innocents are avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

{n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. Innocent ones. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that the innocents are avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

{n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. Innocent ones. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents shall be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

{n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. Innocent ones. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents shall be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

{n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

{n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

languages.text: {n}Konfessor Adalbert schüttelt bedauernd den Kopf.{/n} "Das waren gute Menschen, fromme Menschen. Sie haben niemals in ihrem Leben einen Leibeigenen beleidigt. Wofür also eine Bestrafung?" {n}Seine Miene verdunkelt sich.{/n} "Ich schwöre, dass diese Unschuldigen gerächt werden, der Imperator ist mein Zeuge."
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Konfessor Adalbert schüttelt bedauernd den Kopf.{/n} "Das waren gute Menschen, fromme Menschen. Sie haben niemals in ihrem Leben einen Leibeigenen beleidigt. Wofür also eine Bestrafung?" {n}Seine Miene verdunkelt sich.{/n} "Ich schwöre, dass diese Unschuldigen gerächt werden, der Imperator ist mein Zeuge."

languages.text: {n}El confesor Adalbert menea tristemente la cabeza.{/n} «Eran buenas personas, muy piadosas. Jamás en toda su vida cometieron ofensa alguna. ¿Por qué los castigarían así?». {n}Su rostro se ensombrece.{/n} «Al Emperador pongo por testigo de que estos inocentes serán vengados».
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

traits.locale_text: {n}El confesor Adalbert menea tristemente la cabeza.{/n} «Eran buenas personas, muy piadosas. Jamás en toda su vida cometieron ofensa alguna. ¿Por qué los castigarían así?». {n}Su rostro se ensombrece.{/n} «Al Emperador pongo por testigo de que estos inocentes serán vengados».

languages.text: {n}聴罪師のアダルバートは残念そうに首を横に振った。{/n}「彼らは善良で、信心深い人たちでした。農奴を軽んじたことなど一度もなかった。なぜ彼らを罰するのです？」{n}男の顔は暗くなる。{/n}「この罪なき者たちの仇を討つことを誓います。皇帝よ、見守っていてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

traits.locale_text: {n}聴罪師のアダルバートは残念そうに首を横に振った。{/n}「彼らは善良で、信心深い人たちでした。農奴を軽んじたことなど一度もなかった。なぜ彼らを罰するのです？」{n}男の顔は暗くなる。{/n}「この罪なき者たちの仇を討つことを誓います。皇帝よ、見守っていてください」

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特神父悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“这些人都是好人，是虔诚的人。他们一生中从未怠慢过任何一位仆役，可他们为什么要遭此劫难？”{n}他的脸色变得越来越阴沉。{/n}“我发誓，这些无辜之人一定会大仇得报，愿帝皇为我作证。”
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特神父悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“这些人都是好人，是虔诚的人。他们一生中从未怠慢过任何一位仆役，可他们为什么要遭此劫难？”{n}他的脸色变得越来越阴沉。{/n}“我发誓，这些无辜之人一定会大仇得报，愿帝皇为我作证。”

languages.text: {n}Le confesseur Adalbert secoue la tête d'un air désolé.{/n} « C'étaient de braves gens, de fidèles croyants. Ils n'avaient jamais manqué de respect à un serf de toute leur vie. Pourquoi les avoir punis ainsi ? » {n}Ses traits s'assombrissent.{/n} « Je fais le serment de venger la mort de ces innocents, l'Empereur m'en est témoin ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le confesseur Adalbert secoue la tête d'un air désolé.{/n} « C'étaient de braves gens, de fidèles croyants. Ils n'avaient jamais manqué de respect à un serf de toute leur vie. Pourquoi les avoir punis ainsi ? » {n}Ses traits s'assombrissent.{/n} « Je fais le serment de venger la mort de ces innocents, l'Empereur m'en est témoin ! »

languages.text: {n}Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert kederli bir edayla başını sallıyor.{/n} "İyi insanlardı. Dindar insanlardı. Hayatlarında bir kez olsun bir köleyi aşağılamamışlardır. Onları neden cezalandırırsın?" {n}Yüz ifadesi kararıyor.{/n} "İmparator şahidim olsun, bu masumların intikamının alınacağına yemin ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert ruefully shakes his head.{/n} "They were good people, pious people. They never slighted a serf in their lives. Why punish them?" {n}His face grows darker.{/n} "I swear that these innocents will be avenged, may the Emperor be my witness."
